issue.title: Assertion hit on shutdown of bitcoin-node with connected mining interface client
issue.body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [x] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

Running c0894a0a2be032cd9a5d5945643689230ab10255 `bitcoin-node` with Sjor's [sv2-tp] connected resulted in an unclean shutdown:
```
2025-09-14T10:24:34Z CreateNewBlock(): block weight: 460455 txs: 371 fees: 230840 sigops 1336 
2025-09-14T10:25:05Z CreateNewBlock(): block weight: 513153 txs: 441 fees: 290027 sigops 1489 
2025-09-14T10:25:36Z CreateNewBlock(): block weight: 635048 txs: 541 fees: 370980 sigops 1872 
^C2025-09-14T10:25:53Z tor: Thread interrupt                                                 
2025-09-14T10:25:53Z torcontrol thread exit
2025-09-14T10:25:53Z addcon thread exit                                                                                                                                                    
2025-09-14T10:25:53Z opencon thread exit
2025-09-14T10:25:53Z Shutdown: In progress...                                                
2025-09-14T10:25:53Z net thread exit 
2025-09-14T10:25:54Z msghand thread exit
2025-09-14T10:25:54Z DumpAnchors: Flush 2 outbound block-relay-only peer addresses to anchors.dat started
2025-09-14T10:25:54Z DumpAnchors: Flush 2 outbound block-relay-only peer addresses to anchors.dat completed (0.00s)
2025-09-14T10:25:54Z scheduler thread exit
2025-09-14T10:25:54Z Writing 591 mempool transactions to file...
2025-09-14T10:25:54Z Writing 0 unbroadcast transactions to file.                   
2025-09-14T10:25:54Z Dumped mempool: 0.005s to copy, 0.004s to dump, 348937 bytes dumped to file
2025-09-14T10:25:54Z Flushed fee estimates to fee_estimates.dat.
./node/interfaces.cpp:947 chainman: Assertion `m_node.chainman' failed.
Aborted (core dumped) 
```

### Expected behaviour

No assertions triggered.

### Steps to reproduce

Seems to happen reliably.

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### How did you obtain Bitcoin Core

Compiled from source

### What version of Bitcoin Core are you using?

master@c0894a0a2be032cd9a5d5945643689230ab10255

### Operating system and version

Ubuntu 24.04
